boilerplate.components.Footer.license.me: This project is licensed under the MIT license.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.css.m: Build fast and consistent designs with utility-first CSS framework. Supports responsive design and dark mode while optimizing bundle size.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.feedb: Experience instant hot reload with ESBuild-based ultra-fast development server. Code changes are reflected immediately without page refresh, maximizing development speed.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.subti: Everything you need to build a modern React application
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.inter: Scalable apps need to support multiple languages, easily add and support multiple languages with `react-intl`.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.javas: Provides type safety and enhanced developer experience. Write more stable and maintainable code with compile-time error detection, autocomplete, and refactoring support.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.netwo:
The next frontier in performant web apps: availability without a
      network connection from the instant your users load the app.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.routi: Manage SPA navigation with declarative routing. Supports dynamic routing, nested routes, and programmatic navigation while perfectly integrating with browser history.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.scaff: Modern Redux for state management. Reduce boilerplate with createSlice and createAsyncThunk while easily managing immutability with built-in Immer.
boilerplate.containers.FeaturePage.state: Complete i18n support using React Intl. Supports English, German, and Korean with easy addition of new languages. Provides dynamic language switching and localized date/number formatting.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.start_pr: Start your next react project in seconds
A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices
boilerplate.containers.NotFoundPage.head: Page not found.
